c74object.name: crow.n2v
c74object.digest: Convert MIDI note integers to V/Oct voltage floats.
c74object.description: Specify a root MIDI note which corresponds to 0V, then input a MIDI note integer and generate an output float which corresponds to a volt-per-octave voltage above the base of 0V. Feed the output to crow.volts to convert pitch data in Max to V/oct CV for your modular synthesizer.

objarg.name: Root
objarg.description: Specifies which MIDI note number will result in 0.0V output. All other values will be determined based off that reference.
